name: Equilibrium (meganG22, William7200)
description:
Equilibrium is an educational collection game which teaches the important of balance in our lives. The game has five planets which each symbolize a different aspect of our lives; mind, body, love, hobbies and companionship. An animal on each planet needs your help to retrieve the correct item they need in order to achieve balance and happiness.

Controls -  Arrow Keys - Movement, Space Bar - Jump (on trampolines).

Our Team -  Art - Megan Grant, Production - Nicholas Byrne,  Programming - Conor Tapley, Game Design - William Hulshof.

How to Download & Play - Download the .zip file, extract this file, click onto the folder,  click 'Equilibrium Collab.exe' and enjoy our game!
